name: Trayl
description:
Trayl is a fast-paced arcade game that breathes new life into the saturated Shoot 'em Up genre. It breaks free from conventions and introduces a unique circling mechanic that takes the place of shooting, honing in on the core essence of a Shoot 'em Up -- not shooting, but fast, precise, intense movement.

  • Unique circling mechanic.
  • Full combo levels to unlock new trayls.
  • Over 25 levels and 5 bosses planned.
  • Gorgeous undersea graphics
